content: Stream created by Saul Kravitz.
Lloyd McKenzie renamed stream DaVinci/Drug Formulary Connectathon to Da Vinci/Drug Formulary Connectathon.

Hi Pageen,
A patient-specific formulary lookup is under consideration. I recommend you attend the Da Vinci PDex calls at 12pm EST on Fridays (https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/514633709). That is where the initial discussions are being held; then it will go to the Pharmacy WG. One can certainly pull clinical data such as medications from payers as well via PDex.
